```{r}


library(tidyverse)  
library(readr)
library(tigris)  
library(plotly)  
library(maps)  
library(ggplot2)  
library(ggthemes)  
library(scales)  

altfuel <- read_csv("../data/Alternative_Fueling_Stations.csv")  

usmap <- states(cb=TRUE)  
head(altfuel)
fuelmap <- 
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data=usmap) +
  geom_point(data=altfuel, aes(X, Y, col=fuel_type_code)) +
  theme_few()
fuelmap 
   
```
